poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Bling bly blot he brought his goods To market. See who bought 'em? This one Balked at the dollary. Blot he bopped him On the hooter, boxed his lugs. Market regulator caught him, Bonked his capital, smacked his bot, Blocked his credit. Ruled that Blotty's Merchandise, though blotched and dreck em- Bossed, was nowise - vultures have to eat - Was nowise botched.
